A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've left every Star Wars Movie feeling a sense of awe & exhileration-until The Last Jedi. Just had no emotional attachment to the story at all. Unless you count boredom & irritation. Keeping Finn and Rey apart the entire movie-he IS the only character that brings the charm-and saddling her w Gloomy Gus Luke didn't add wto the movie. And way too many convenient fortuitous moments that felt cringeworthy-Leia awakening from her coma in the nick of time\, Yoda appearing\, etc.
